name: CHERNOBYL 8-bit
description:
CHERNOBYL 8-bit
Year 1991. Aliens from outer space invade Chernobyl Nuclear Zone. You are super SPECNAZ lone wolf soldier! Run fast! Shot fast! Kill fast! Enjoy free retro hardcore parody game.

Lock 'n Load! Get your weapons ready for the ultimate parody action game. Chernobyl 8-bit combines hardcore of retro run and gun Contra style games and new classic FPS S.T.A.L.K.E.R.

Blow up all evil alien enemies! Kill them all in this free parody shooter game.

- Different TV modes!
- Classic hardcore from NES edge!
- 5 levels in pixel hell!
